title: Go for Front End Developers - GopherConIndia 2015
description:
Julia works mainly in JavaScript on web applications, and has recently picked up Go in the past year.
“Go is a better designed language than JavaScript”. She’s heard this a lot from people in the Go community, but wants to present her perspective as a JavaScript programmer.
JavaScript is great - very beginner friendly, you can do things on both the server-side with Node and, of course, the front-end side.
